ygData.subject: Re: Rawhide Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Pledge and Initiate Familiars in Mistmoore drop Raw-hide armor very often... Ylandril Feanaro  High Elf Wizard of the 11th Initiate Mithaniel Marr
ygData.messageBody:
Pledge and Initiate Familiars in Mistmoore drop Raw-hide armor very often...

Ylandril Feanaro <Soulforge>
High Elf Wizard of the 11th Initiate
Mithaniel Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Shadowwalker <Shadowwalker@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 7:09 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Rawhide Armor


> From: "Shadowwalker" <Shadowwalker@...>
>
> Does anyone know what mobs drop rawhide armor, preferably consistantly.
Thanks
>
> -Shadowwalker
